PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-09752024-08-28PPC
ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
PrecisAppointment of LOUISE SMOLSKA of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective September 23, 2024.
